title: The Impact of Third-Party Scripts on the Facebook Outage
description: A lot has already been written about the Facebook outage earlier this week. In case you missed it (if that?s possible), Facebook, Facebook Messenger, Instagram, and WhatsApp were all down for several hours on Monday. Facebook provided an update on the cause of the outage late Monday, citing a configuration change on their backbone routers as the root cause, with additional details in a subsequent blog post.
author: Kunjal Botadra
